skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the voice computing book
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is the skill for the ultimate book about the voice computing revolution—Talk to Me, by James Vlahos, (March 26, 2019, Houghton Mifflin Harcourt). Voice computing, the biggest technological disruption since the smartphone, is going to change everything about the way we live, work, and think. This skill will help you learn how!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
